casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cornelius TUCKER, Jr. No. 118P01-15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of February 2006 by Defendant to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
